description:
Honma Meiko, nicknamed Menma, is a ghost girl who suddenly appears to Jinta several years after her death. Menma asks him to reunite their group of friends so her wish can be granted. She does not seem to remember what is her wish, but she knows she has to reunite her friends in order to remember.
It is hinted that she has feelings for Jinta, and that only Jinta is able to see her.
name: Honma Meiko
